**Why Codeberg?**
* Non-profit
* Git version control
* Users can influence decision making - but only when they become active members.
* Free
* EU based - with privacy guidelines (GDPR) in mind


1. Create a `Codeberg` account on their website: https://codeberg.org/user/sing_up

1. Activate your account via the email that was sent to you.
